name: Spacefighter
overview: The prevalence of the once highly cultured human race in the universe has been broken for centuries. the extruders, a highly intelligent, but completely unfeeling, breed of lizard, spread more and more in the outskirts of the worlds. But hope is now germinating in the slave camps of the extrudian empire: one tells of a spacefighter in a space cruiser eagle mk 3, who wants to search the blue gene on the planet intro for the salvation of humanity. Against this backdrop, they now appear as commander of the eagle mk3 in scene. You're in the atmosphere of the peaceful oxygen world Ilfus on the edge of the Pegus system. Your ship is equipped only with the most-needed: take-off device and buglaser of the class 4. You have to abandon your ship for the dangerous mission. Since your capital is only 100 cr (credits), you should first get money. The most convenient method is by catching animals. Published in Magic Disk 64 1990/03.
